Articles.Content: Whenever I attach my jet engines to hard points, they never seem to fire. I have tried adding fuel lines and it does nothing. They only ever seem to fire if I attach them directly to the fuselage without a hard point. If anyone knows a solution to this it would be much appreciated.

Hi kacmando and welcome to the KSP community.

It\'d really help if you could upload some pics of your jets to a site such as Imgur and then link them here so we can see.

Also, upload your craft file using the attachments feature below the text box, so other players can test your jet directly.

Then hopefully someone will be able to solve your problem

I think it\'s to do with fuel tanks. Engines only work if they are attached to something above them that can feed them fuel, fuel lines don\'t count for this purpose.

Make sure your engine is attached under a part that\'s either a fuel tank or something that says 'fuel crossfeed capable'.
